markdownRemark.html:
Custom Editors

Material Palette Generator

The Color Pro package includes 3 custom Editor windows for generating materials from colors. These windows can be accessed from Window > Material Palette Generator > ...


ğŸŒˆ Colors

Converts a predefined array of colors to materials. Each material is cloned from a base material and the main color is set on the material.

ğŸ­ Gradient

Interpolates a linear amount of stops of a gradient converted into materials. Each material is cloned from a base material and the main color is set on the material.

ğŸ”² Monochromatic

Generates tints, shades, or tones of color converted into materials. Each material is cloned from a base material and the main color is set on the material.
